timeline.bodyText: These seem excessively long 🤔 didn't know this was valid

+~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+``addAppVersion``
+~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+
+Specify the version of the app using Envoy Mobile. This information is sent as identifying

We should move forward with these changes but something that we will need to figure out when we revisit our ergononmics:
These properties leak the Android abstraction onto the EnvoyConfiguration :(
Ideally, we should have a separate configuration for Android and Java libraries
